about_the_game:
In Car Mechanic Workshop, you will repair cars, apply custom paints, upgrade parts from the shop, and test your creations on the circuit. Expand your skills as you build, customize, and fine-tune vehicles in this hands-on mechanic simulator.

About Car Mechanic Workshop

In Car Mechanic Workshop, step into the shoes of a skilled mechanic and take on the challenge of repairing, upgrading, and customizing cars. Start with two vehicles, diagnose issues, and replace or upgrade parts using a variety of tools and components from the shop. Add custom paints to create your perfect design, and test your handiwork on the circuit to ensure everything runs smoothly.

Key Features

As development progresses, expect a broader roster of vehicles, more intricate repair options, and an expanded selection of parts to enhance performance and style. Whether you're a casual player or a car enthusiast, Car Mechanic Workshop offers a satisfying blend of creativity and mechanical problem-solving.
